section0.title: The Villa
section0.content: Experience unparalleled luxury with the exclusive rental of our entire villa, offering privacy, comfort, and breathtaking views for an unforgettable stay.
section0.subcontent: Choose to book the entire property and immerse yourself in the splendor of our Provençal villa, a true masterpiece of neo-Provencal design. The villa's layout seamlessly connects two independent wings, allowing for both privacy and togetherness. This exceptional property accommodates up to 10 adults and 3 children, providing ample space for everyone to enjoy.

section2.title: Premium Suite
section2.livingroomxsubtitle: A Haven of Luxury and Comfort

section2xbedroom.content:
Discover unmatched luxury in our premium second-floor bedroom. This spacious suite features a king-sized bed, a fully glazed partition for natural light, and a private terrace with stunning views.

The ensuite bathroom is a haven with a freestanding bathtub, a luxurious shower system with invigorating body jets, and a rainforest shower. Elegant fixtures create a spa-like experience.

A spacious walk-in closet and thoughtfully placed seating areas complete this serene retreat.
section2xbedroom.bullet1:
• King size bed
• Bed linen
• Extra pillows and blankets
• Blackout blinds
• Iron
• Clothing storage: walk-in closet and wardrobe
section2xbedroom.bullet2:
• Bathtub
• Rain shower and massage jets
• Shampoos
• Conditioner
• Shower gel
• Hairdryer

section2xkidsroom.content:
Our enchanting kids' room is designed to spark joy and creativity.

This delightful space features vibrant décor, cozy beds, and ample storage for toys and belongings. Thoughtfully designed with young guests in mind, the room includes a play area filled with engaging activities, ensuring endless fun.

With safety and comfort as top priorities, this magical retreat offers children their own special haven within the villa, creating unforgettable memories during their stay.
section2xkidsroom.bullet1:
• Bed linens
• Extra pillows and blankets
• Children’s books and toys
• Clothing storage
• Cinema-sized television: 215cm (85in)
section2xkidsroom.bullet2:
• Shower
• Shampoos
• Conditioner
• Shower gel
• Hairdryer

section2xlivingroom.content:
Step into our spacious living room, where luxury and comfort harmonize effortlessly. A large, stylish couch invites relaxation, complemented by a rejuvenating massage chair nearby. Enjoy cinematic experiences on the super-sized TV while natural light floods through large windows, illuminating the elegant space.

A grand piano adds a touch of sophistication, perfect for music enthusiasts, while a cozy reading area offers a serene spot for literary escapes. This living room is designed to indulge your senses and provide a haven of relaxation and entertainment.
section2xlivingroom.bullet:
• Large couch
• Luxurious massage chair
• TV
• Wi-Fi
• Piano
• Sound system
• Stylish single couch
• Large windows and doors

section2xworkplace.content:
Experience productivity and relaxation seamlessly intertwined in our sophisticated workspace. 

With a spacious desk, ergonomic seating, and ample natural light, this area fosters focus and creativity. High-speed internet ensures seamless connectivity for work or leisure, complemented by a cozy corner for moments of reflection.

Discover a perfect blend of functionality and comfort designed to enhance your stay.
section2xworkplace.bullet:
• Dedicated workspace
• Wifi is available in all areas and is free of charge.

section2xkitchen.content:
Step into our expansive kitchen, a beacon of sophistication and functionality. 

It features a grand central island with a stylish bar, perfect for culinary creativity and social gatherings. 

Equipped with top-of-the-line appliances and bathed in natural light, this space effortlessly connects with the living room or dining area, ensuring every meal is a luxurious experience shared with loved ones.
section2xkitchen.bullet:
• Kitchen
• Refrigerator
• Cooking basics (Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper)
• Dishes and silverware
• Dishwasher
• Oven
• Coffee maker
• Wine glasses
• Toaster
• Blender
• Thermomix
• Microwave
• Large central island

section2xdiningroom.content:
Immerse yourself in a luxurious dining experience in our elegantly appointed dining area. A stunning marble-top table awaits, offering seating for ten and commanding views of the lush garden and mirror infinity pool. 

This sophisticated setting is perfect for enjoying gourmet meals while staying connected with the beauty of the outdoors, making every dining moment a memorable occasion at our villa.
section2xdiningroom.bullet:
• 10-seater dining table
• Complete set of utensils
• Children’s dinnerware
• Folding or convertible high chair
• Beautiful lighting fixtures
• Window door leading to the backyard

section3xviolet.title: Violet Room
section3xviolet.subtitle: Pool View Suite
section3xviolet.content:
Discover our Violet bedroom, adorned with a private terrace offering stunning vistas of the mirror infinity pool. This exquisite retreat features luxurious king-size beds, ample wardrobe space, and secure safes for your valuables. Extra pillows and blankets ensure personalized comfort, while modern amenities like flat-screen TVs and high-speed internet keep you connected and entertained.

This bedroom includes an en-suite bathroom, ensuring ultimate convenience and privacy.

Every detail in our meticulously designed bedrooms guarantees a serene and sophisticated stay, promising rest and relaxation amidst picturesque views.
section3xviolet.bullet1:
• Queen size bed 
• Bed linens
• Extra pillows and blankets
• Clothing storage
section3xviolet.bullet2:
• Shower
• Shampoo
• Conditioner
• Shower gel
• Hairdryer

section3xpeony.title: Peony Room
section3xpeony.subtitle: Pool View Bedroom with Separated Private Bathroom
section3xpeony.content:
Welcome to our serene bedroom, offering a private terrace and breathtaking views of the mirror infinity pool and the magnificent garden. These luxurious sanctuaries feature king-size beds adorned with plush linens, ample clothing storage, and secure safes for your convenience. Enjoy personalized comfort with extra pillows and blankets, along with modern amenities such as TVs and high-speed internet, ensuring connectivity and entertainment. 

This pool-view bedroom has its bathroom conveniently located just next to the room, providing easy access.
section3xpeony.bullet1:
• Queen size bed 
• Bed linens
• Extra pillows and blankets
• Clothing storage
section3xpeony.bullet2:
• Shower
• Shampoo
• Conditioner
• Shower gel
• Hairdryer

section3xorchid.title: Orchid Room
section3xorchid.subtitle: Pool View Suite without Terrasse
section3xorchid.content:
Discover tranquility and sophistication in this inviting bedroom, complete with a private en-suite bathroom. Tastefully designed for comfort, the room features a large window that invites natural light to dance across the space, creating a warm and welcoming ambiance throughout the day. Thoughtful touches of elegant decor and plush furnishings ensure a luxurious retreat, perfect for unwinding after a long day. 

Whether for a peaceful night's sleep or a moment of quiet reflection, this bedroom offers a harmonious blend of comfort and style.
section3xorchid.bullet1:
• Queen size bed 
• Bed linens
• Extra pillows and blankets
• Clothing storage
section3xorchid.bullet2:
• Shower
• Shampoo
• Conditioner
• Shower gel
• Hairdryer

section3xlilac.title: Lilac Room
section3xlilac.subtitle: Basement Suite
section3xlilac.content:
Nestled adjacent to the subterranean entertainment haven, the en-suite bathroom epitomizes a seamless blend of luxury and functionality. 

A defining element of this room is the strategically placed window, ingeniously linked to a sun tunnel, which create a bright and airy atmosphere, enhancing the overall ambiance of the room.

Enjoy some downtime in this cozy bedroom, complete with all the essentials for a restful stay.
section3xlilac.bullet1:
• Queen size bed 
• Bed linens
• Extra pillows and blankets
• Clothing storage
section3xlilac.bullet2:
• Shower
• Shampoo
• Conditioner
• Shower gel
• Hairdryer

section3xliving.title: Living Room
section3xliving.subtitle: Cozy Guest Living Space
section3xliving.content:
The guest house living room is a blend of comfort and modern amenities, providing an ideal space for relaxation and entertainment. Featuring a comfortable sofa and stylish decor, this room offers a cozy retreat with a stunning view of the pool. 

Guests can unwind while watching their favorite shows on the flat-screen TV or stay connected with high-speed internet. Large windows not only frame the beautiful pool view but also flood the room with natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere perfect for relaxation or socializing.
section3xliving.bullet:
• Large couch
• TV
• Wi-Fi
• Sound system
• Large windows and doors

section3xkitchen.title: Kitchen & Dining
section3xkitchen.subtitle: Guest Kitchen and Dining Retreat
section3xkitchen.content:
The guest house boasts a modern and fully equipped kitchen, designed for convenience and style. This sophisticated space features high-end appliances, ample counter space, and all the essentials you need to prepare gourmet meals. 

The adjacent dining area, with its elegant design and comfortable seating, is perfect for enjoying meals with family and friends. Large windows provide plenty of natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Whether you're preparing a quick breakfast or a lavish dinner, the kitchen and dining area in the guest house offer a delightful culinary experience.
section3xkitchen.bullet:
• 6-seater dining table
• Dishes and silverware
• Refrigerator
• Oven
• Coffee maker
• Cooking basics (Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper)
• Dishwasher
• Window door leading to the backyard
• Microwave
• Nespresso coffee machine

section4xtheater.title: Private Home Cinema
section4xtheater.subtitle: Experience cinematic luxury in our private home cinema, where every detail is designed for your utmost comfort and enjoyment.
section4xtheater.content:
The stars sky ceiling creates an enchanting atmosphere, transporting you to a celestial world as you watch your favorite films. A state-of-the-art projector and immersive home cinema sound system ensure a top-tier viewing experience. 

Sink into the laid-back, extendable sofas, which offer adjustable comfort to relax at any angle. This dedicated movie theatre promises an unparalleled entertainment experience in the privacy of your villa.
section4xtheater.bullet:
• Projector
• Projector Screen
• Sound System
• Couch
• Wifi is available in all areas and is free of charge.

section4xplayroom.title: Playroom
section4xplayroom.subtitle: Unleash your inner child in our vibrant Playroom, fun for kids and adults alike!
section4xplayroom.content:
Step into our ultimate playroom paradise, designed to delight guests of all ages. This vibrant space is equipped with a billiard table, darts, arcade games, foosball, air hockey, puzzles, and a selection of toys and board games. 

A TV with internet access ensures endless entertainment options. Ideal for birthday celebrations or simply letting the kids enjoy themselves, this playroom is truly a haven for fun. 

Outside, a terrace with synthetic grass offers additional space for friendly outdoor games like football or basketball , ensuring hours of active play and enjoyment.
section4xplayroom.bullet:
• Table tennis
• Darts
• Billiards
• Children Toys
• Board games/puzzles
• Arcade Games
• Air hockey
• Footbal Table

section4xspa.title: Wellness Escape
section4xspa.subtitle: Indulge in a serene oasis where tranquility meets luxury, allowing your mind, body, and soul to rejuvenate in perfect harmony.
section4xspa.content: Indulge in ultimate relaxation at our spa and wellness sanctuary. Unwind in the rejuvenating warmth of our sauna, designed to detoxify and invigorate your senses. Soothe your muscles and mind in our luxurious jacuzzi, offering a serene escape from everyday stress. Every element of our wellness area is crafted to provide a tranquil and restorative experience, ensuring you leave feeling refreshed and revitalized.
section4xspa.bullet:
• Spa facilities
• Massage chair
• Hot tub/Jacuzzi
• Sauna

section4xgym.title: State-of-the-Art Gym
section4xgym.subtitle: Step into our cutting-edge home gym, where sleek design meets top-tier equipment, creating the ultimate space for invigorating workouts and personal wellness.
section4xgym.content:
Our well-appointed gym offers everything you need to maintain your fitness routine during your stay. 

Equipped with a variety of fitness machines, free weights, and yoga mats, it caters to all workout preferences. Large windows provide a stunning view of the pool, allowing you to do cardio while taking in the serene water vistas. 

With modern amenities and a thoughtfully designed layout, this gym ensures a comfortable and effective exercise experience.
section4xgym.bullet:
• Fitness Wheel
• Rowing Machine
• Kettlebell set
• Multi-grip pull-up bars
• Dual Adjustable Pulley
• bench press
• MMA Boxing Speed Trainer Punching Spinning Bar with Dual Punch Head

section4xpool.title: Mirror Infinity Pool
section4xpool.subtitle: Escape to serenity at our tranquil oasis, where the shimmering waters of our private swimming pool beckon you to unwind and soak up the sun in luxurious comfort.
section4xpool.content:
Immerse yourself in the splendor of our magnificent 15x5m mirror infinity pool, the epitome of elegance and relaxation. This stunning pool features a unique design where water cascades seamlessly over the edges, creating a captivating visual effect and a sense of boundless tranquility. 

Treated with salt water, it offers a gentler and more skin-friendly alternative to traditional chlorine treatments. 

A shallow area, only 45cm deep, is perfect for children to safely enjoy, while a beautiful fountain adds to the serene ambiance. Positioned to offer breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape, our infinity pool promises a luxurious and serene swimming experience for all ages.
section4xpool.bullet:
• Mirror Infinity pool
• Saltwater pool
• Graceful Fountain element
• Swimming pool toys
• Beach chairs/Loungers
• Beach umbrellas

section4xplayground.title: Outdoor Playground
section4xplayground.subtitle: Unleash joy and adventure at our vibrant playground area, where laughter and imagination come to life.
section4xplayground.content:
Delight in the vibrant outdoor playground, a paradise for children filled with exciting activities. Featuring sliders, turnstile roundabout, a swing set designed for toddlers and kids, a climbing rope, and a trampoline, this play area promises endless fun and adventure. For the more daring, a thrilling zip line adds an extra element of excitement. Enjoy the inflatable clear ball for walking on water, offering a unique and fun zorb experience. 

A pétanque field provides a classic outdoor game for all ages to enjoy.

Every aspect of our playground is crafted to ensure safety and enjoyment, making it the perfect spot for all ages to explore and play in lively environment.
section4xplayground.bullet:
• Swings
• Slides
• Tranmpoline
• Children Zipline
• Children’s bikes
• Petanque
• Bicycle rental (Additional charge)

section4xoutdoor.title: Outdoor Living Space
section4xoutdoor.subtitle: Embrace the charm of outdoor living with cozy evenings by the fire, al fresco dining, and leisurely moments in our beautiful garden terrace.
section4xoutdoor.content:
Experience the epitome of outdoor luxury around our stunning swimming pool and lush garden. 

This expansive area is designed for relaxation and entertainment, featuring barbecue facilities and a large dining table perfect for alfresco meals. Comfortable outdoor furniture, lounge chairs, and a sun deck invite you to unwind and soak up the sun. 

As evening falls, gather around the outdoor fireplace for a cozy ambiance, making this the ultimate space for enjoying the beauty and tranquility of your surroundings.
section4xoutdoor.bullet:
• Terrasse
• Outdoor fireplace
• Outdoor furniture
• Sun deck
• BBQ facilities (Additional charge)
• Garden
